General.Name: edding AG
General.Description: edding AG develops, manufactures, and distributes products for writing and marking, and visual communication in Germany, other European countries, and internationally. It operates through Writing and Marking, Visual Communication, Technological Solutions, and Others segments. The company's products portfolio includes markers, refilling inks, and related solutions; fine liners, fiber pens, and color sets; home, office, and school highlighters; gel rollers, correctors and cutters, and special solutions; and funstatic products for children. It also provides accessories, such as refills and spare nibs, erasers, spares, and white board equipment; painters; heating iron for wooden floor waxes; furniture and wooden floor repair wax kits; board cleaners; note writers; and writing implements/utensils, color sprays, printer cartridges and toners, and nail polishes. In addition, the company offers flipcharts, whiteboards, and presentation boards and related accessories, as well as interactive products, including LED screens with touch technology for schools and conference rooms, and interactive whiteboards under the Legamaster brand. Further, it provides industrial labeling technology, compact printers, edding code, and prisma ID solutions, as well as game-based brand protection services; and engages in the tattooing related activities. The company offers its products to business-to-business sector and private end consumers. edding AG was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Ahrensburg, Germany.
